title.narrative: Provincial Water Supply and Sanitation Project

description.narrative: The project will expand and improve urban water supply and sanitation (WSS) services in four of Cambodia's largest provincial cities, which are important commercial, industrial, and tourist centers but lack access to piped WSS services. The project will also improve institutional capacity to provide sustainable WSS services.
